basic.Source: Synthetic construct(derived from HSV-1 B glycoprotein (gB))
basic.Target Organism: [Ref.19104014]Herpes simplex virus type 1(HSV-1):comprehensive antiviral activity(EC50=15.0±2.2 µM);inhibition of virus entry in Vero cells(EC50=17.6±2.6 µM);inhibition of virus infection in Vero cells(EC50=71.5±17.4 µM);ability of inactive virus(EC50=118±11.6 µM);inhibition of virus attachment on Vero cells(EC50>200 µM).
